plurals.name: ApplicationPreferencesActivity_this_will_immediately_trim_all_conversations_to_the_d_most_recent_messages
plurals.item: This will immediately trim all conversations to the most recent message.
This will immediately trim all conversations to the %d most recent messages.

resources.string: Can\'t find an app to select media.

University of Port Harcourt Chat requires the Storage permission in order to attach photos, videos, or audio, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".

University of Port Harcourt Chat requires the Camera permission in order to take photos, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".
Received key exchange message, tap to process.
Send failed, tap for unsecured fallback
Can\'t find an app able to open this media.
Sorry, there was an error setting your attachment.
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
You will once again be able to receive messages and calls from this contact.
Attachment exceeds size limits for the type of message you\'re sending.
There is no app available to handle this link on your device.
University of Port Harcourt Chat needs microphone access to send audio messages.

University of Port Harcourt Chat needs microphone access to send audio messages, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\".
University of Port Harcourt Chat needs camera access to take photos and videos.
University of Port Harcourt Chat needs storage access to send photos and videos.
University of Port Harcourt Chat needs camera access to take photos and videos, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".
University of Port Harcourt Chat needs camera access to take photos or videos.
You can enable the \'Voice and video calls\' permission in the Privacy Settings.

This will permanently delete all %1$d selected messages.

resources.string: Received a message encrypted using an old version of University of Port Harcourt Chat that is no longer supported. Please ask the sender to update to the most recent version and resend the message.
Messages sent and received in this conversation will disappear %s after they have been seen.
You will no longer receive messages and calls from this contact.
You will once again be able to receive messages and calls from this contact.
Received key exchange message for invalid protocol version.
Received message with new safety number. Tap to process and display.
You reset the secure University of Port Harcourt Chat.
%s reset the secure University of Port Harcourt Chat.
Secure University of Port Harcourt Chat reset.
%s is on University of Port Harcourt Chat!
Your safety number with %s has changed.
University of Port Harcourt Chat update
A new version of University of Port Harcourt Chat is available, tap to update
Message encrypted for non-existing University of Port Harcourt Chat
MMS message encrypted for non-existing University of Port Harcourt Chat
University of Port Harcourt Chat is unlocked
Lock University of Port Harcourt Chat

University of Port Harcourt Chat needs storage access in order to save to external storage, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".
Unable to save to external storage without permissions
This will permanently delete this message.
Pending University of Port Harcourt Chat messages
You have pending University of Port Harcourt Chat messages, tap to open and retrieve
Quick response unavailable when University of Port Harcourt Chat is locked!
Enable University of Port Harcourt Chat for SMS
Tapping the Enter Key will send message instead of starting a new line.
Generate link previews for supported URLs.
Block screenshots in the recents list and inside the app
Automatically delete older messages once a conversation exceeds a specified length
Scan through all conversations and enforce conversation length limits
Send read receipts in one-to-one chats.
See and share typing indicators in one-to-one chats.
Request keyboard to disable personalized learning
Delete messages older than 6 months from communities that have over 2,000 messages.
Disable University of Port Harcourt Chat\'s built-in emoji support
Receive a notification when a contact takes a screenshot of a one-to-one chat.
Backups will be saved to external storage and encrypted with the passphrase below. You must have this passphrase in order to restore a backup.
I have written down this passphrase. Without it, I will be unable to restore a backup.
Cannot import backups from newer versions of University of Port Harcourt Chat
Please acknowledge your understanding by marking the confirmation check box.
Disable and delete all local backups?
Lock University of Port Harcourt Chat
Require fingerprint, PIN, pattern or password to unlock University of Port Harcourt Chat.
It\'s a decentralized, encrypted messaging app
So it doesn\'t collect my personal information or my conversation metadata? How does it work?
Using a combination of advanced anonymous routing and end-to-end encryption technologies.
Friends don\'t let friends use compromised messengers. You\'re welcome.
Say hello to your Uniport Hash Address

Your Uniport Hash Address is the unique address people can use to contact you on University of Port Harcourt Chat. With no connection to your real identity, your Uniport Hash Address is totally anonymous and private by design.
Enter the recovery phrase that was given to you when you signed up to restore your account.
This will be your name when you use University of Port Harcourt Chat. It can be your real name, an alias, or anything else you like.
Please pick a shorter display name
You don\'t have any contacts yet
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?

Your recovery phrase is the master key to your Uniport Hash Address — you can use it to restore your Uniport Hash Address if you lose access to your device. Store your recovery phrase in a safe place, and don\'t give it to anyone.
Secure your account by saving your recovery phrase
Tap and hold the redacted words to reveal your recovery phrase, then store it safely to secure your Uniport Hash Address.
Make sure to store your recovery phrase in a safe place

University of Port Harcourt Chat hides your IP by bouncing your messages through several Service Nodes in University of Port Harcourt Chat\'s decentralized network. These are the countries your connection is currently being bounced through:
New University of Port Harcourt Chat
Scan a user\'s QR code to start a University of Port Harcourt Chat. QR codes can be found by tapping the QR code icon in account settings.
Enter Uniport Hash Address or ONS name
Users can share their Uniport Hash Address by going into their account settings and tapping "Share Uniport Hash Address", or by sharing their QR code.
Please check the Uniport Hash Address or ONS name and try again.
University of Port Harcourt Chat needs camera access to scan QR codes
You don\'t have any contacts yet
Please enter a shorter group name
Please pick at least 1 group member
A closed group cannot have more than 100 members
Scan the QR code of the open group you\'d like to join
Please pick a shorter display name
Help us Translate University of Port Harcourt Chat
Export your logs, then upload the file though University of Port Harcourt Chat\'s Help Desk.
Translate University of Port Harcourt Chat
You\'ll be notified of new messages reliably and immediately using Google\'s notification servers.
You can use your recovery phrase to restore your account or link a device.
This will permanently delete your messages, University of Port Harcourt Chats, and contacts.
Would you like to clear only this device, or delete your entire account?
This will permanently delete your messages, University of Port Harcourt Chats, and contacts. Would you like to clear only this device, or delete your entire account?
Are you sure you want to delete your data from the network? If you continue you will not be able to restore your messages or contacts.
Scan someone\'s QR code to start a conversation with them
This is your QR code. Other users can scan it to start a University of Port Harcourt Chat with you.
You don\'t have any contacts yet
Please enter a shorter group name
Groups must have at least 1 group member
Secure University of Port Harcourt Chat reset done
Failed to activate backups. Please try again or contact support.
Select a backup file and enter the passphrase it was created with.
This is taking a while, would you like to skip?
Navigate to Settings → Recovery Phrase on your other device to show your QR code.
I be don add all this one before
There are two ways Uniport-Chat can notify you of new messages.
You’ll be notified of new messages reliably and immediately using Google’s notification servers.
University of Port Harcourt Chat will occasionally check for new messages in the background.
University of Port Harcourt Chat is Locked
Are you sure you want to unblock %s?
Are you sure you want to join the %s open group?
Are you sure you want to open %s?

Enabling link previews will show previews for URLs you send and receive. This can be useful, but University of Port Harcourt Chat will need to contact linked websites to generate previews. You can always disable link previews in University of Port Harcourt Chat\'s settings.
Are you sure you want to download media sent by %s?
Failed to prepare attachment for sending.
This is your recovery phrase. If you send it to someone they\'ll have full access to your account.
Would you like to export your application logs to be able to share for troubleshooting?
Sending a message to this user will automatically accept their message request and reveal your Uniport Hash Address.
Are you sure you want to decline this message request?
Are you sure you want to block this message request?
Are you sure you want to clear all message requests?
Your message request has been accepted.
Your message request is currently pending.
You have a new message request
Enables voice and video calls to and from other users.
Your IP address is visible to your call partner and an Oxen Foundation server while using beta calls. Are you sure you want to enable Voice and Video Calls?
You missed a call because you need to enable the \'Voice and video calls\' permission in the Privacy Settings.
University of Port Harcourt Chat Call
Having notifications disabled will prevent you from receiving calls, go to University of Port Harcourt Chat notification settings?
